name: Merciless Greatsword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Mystic Essence of Success
description: Combine Mystic Essence of Determination, Mystic Essence of Challenge, Mystic Essence of Discipline, and Mystic Essence of Success in the Mystic Forge to create the Vial of Salt.

name: Perfect Mist Core
description: Combine in the Mystic Forge with 2 Vision Crystals, 250 Shards of Glory, and 5 Certificates of Support to create the Gift of Skirmishing.

name: Veteran's Wings of Glory
description: Combine all 4 Wings of Glory to obtain Wings of Ascension, precursor to the Ascension.

name: Glorious Armor Box
description: This armor box contains unique armor skins, mist core fragments, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers.

name: Vintage Silver Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Merciless Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Snowflake Glider
description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

name: Merciless Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Merciless Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Mist Core Fragment
description: Double-click 4 Mist Core Fragments to create a Perfect Mist Core. Combine with Mystic Clovers, Gift of Condensed Might, and Gift of Condensed Magic in the Mystic Forge to create Gift of Competitive Prosperity.

name: Merciless Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Dry Silver Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Essence of Success
description: Combine with 20 Vicious Claws, 50 Large Claws, and 10 Globs of Dark Matter in the Mystic Forge to create a Mystic Essence of Success.

name: Wings of Ascension
description: Used to craft the Legendary backpack, the Ascension.

name: Mini Turai Ossa
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Monument of Legends
description: Combine the Thrill of Battle, Tapestry of Sacrifice, Monument of Legends, and Hymn of Glory in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of the Competitor.

name: Gold Fusion Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Essence of Discipline
description: Combine with 20 Armored Scales, 50 Large Scales, and 250 Dragonite Ore in the Mystic Forge to create a Mystic Essence of Discipline.

name: Silver Guild Challenger Reward
description: Contains Silver Guild Challenger Trophy; Potions of PvP Reward; and Guild Challenger Decoration token, coin, and items that help restore your guild arena.

name: Merciless Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Merciless Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Hymn of Glory
description: Combine the Thrill of Battle, Tapestry of Sacrifice, Monument of Legends, and Hymn of Glory in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of the Competitor.

name: Bronze Guild Challenger Reward
description: Contains Bronze Guild Challenger Trophy; Potions of PvP Reward; and Guild Challenger Decoration token, coin, and items that help restore your guild arena.

name: Essence of Determination
description: Combine with 20 Vials of Powerful Blood, 50 Vials of Potent Blood, and 250 Piles of Bloodstone Dust in the Mystic Forge to create a Mystic Essence of Determination.

name: Matriarch Brass Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Merciless Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Golden Sheen Dye
description: Double-click to unlock this dye color for all characters.

name: Merciless Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Merciless Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Condition Damage Equal to 8% of Your Expertise
+10% Experience from Kills
+10% Karma Bonus

name: Enchanted Snowball
description: Double-click to encase yourself in snow.

details.name: Enhancement
details.description:
Gain Power Equal to 3% of Your Precision
Gain Power Equal to 6% of Your Ferocity
+10% Experience from Kills
+10% Karma Bonus

name: Angry Wintersday Gift's Gratitude
description:
Through your effort to show your Angry Wintersday Gift why it's covered in bows and ribbons, it now has the real Wintersday spirit. Inside the gift was this bag, which it gave to you as thanks for helping others.

When you shake the bag, it sounds like it might have a glider skin in it.

Double-click to open.

name: Timekeeper Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Festive Streetlamp
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mini Tizlak
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Timekeeper Focus Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Zephyrite Color Swatch: Red
description: Double-click to open and choose a nonexclusive dye from the red spectrum.

details.name: Nourishment
details.description:
Gain Health Every Second
+70 Vitality
+10% Experience from Kills
+10% Karma

name: Fractal Adept's Research Chest
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains a Pristine Fractal Relic, 2 +1 Agony Infusions, a Large Mist Mobility Potion, 3 Fractal Encryptions, and a Fractal Research Page.
Bonus rewards with the Agony Channeler or Recursive Resourcing Mastery.

name: Mini Snow Flurry Dragon
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Timekeeper Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Magnanimous Obsidian Crystal
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Snowglobe
description: Grants 10,000 karma.

name: Timekeeper Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Timekeeper Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Mini Charitable Gift Skritt
description:
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine Charitable Gift Skritt minis, Wintersday Gifts, Snowflakes, and an Essence of Skrittish Charity in the Mystic Forge to make a Mini Munificent Gift Skritt.

name: Preserved Queen Bee
description: Double-click to apply this to a trinket.

buff.description:
+12 Condition Damage
+12 Precision
+12 Toughness
+12 Power
+12 Vitality
+12 Healing Power
+12 Ferocity

name: Winter Solstice Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Wintersday Tree
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Zephyrite Color Swatch: Blue
description: Double-click to open and choose a nonexclusive dye from the blue spectrum.

name: Essence of Skrittish Charity
description: Combine in the Mystic Forge with Gift Skritt minis to improve their Wintersday spirit.

name: Shiny Cog
description: The cog sparkles and looks brand-new. This should be good enough to present to the skritt king in Skrittsburgh.

name: Timekeeper Scepter Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Timekeeper Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Timekeeper Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Wintersday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Peppermint Omnomberry Bar
description: Double-click to learn the chef recipe for Peppermint Omnomberry Bar.

name: Festive Grymm Svaard
description: Consume to unlock this unique Mist Champion skin on your account.

name: Ultimate Wintersday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Timekeeper Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Recipe: Tuning Icicle
description: Double-click to unlock the artificer recipe for a Tuning Icicle.

name: Roll of Wrapping Paper
description: Used to wrap ugly wool clothes and toy weapons for the orphans of Divinity's Reach.

name: Snow Maker
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Refurbished Toy
description: Grants 10,000 karma.

name: Skritt King's Royal Wintersday Decree
description:
This decree permits you to help spread cheer around Skrittsburgh to show your "angry shiny" what Wintersday is about. It's attached to a small pillow given to you by the skritt king to hold the creature.

The decree is only valid in the skritt king's home territory of Brisban Wildlands.

Double-click to start the party!

name: Recipe: Tin of Fruitcake
description: Double-click to unlock the weaponsmith recipe for Tin of Fruitcake.

name: Winter Music Score
description: Grants 10,000 karma.

name: Mini Angry Wintersday Gift
description:
Something is making Wintersday gifts angry, and we've got a whole pile of them! Is it something inside? Outside? Or is it just wrapped too tightly?

Talk to Collector Terksli to unwrap this seasonal oddity.

Minis are tiny models of creatures from around the world. They can be collected and activated one at a time to follow you around.

name: Blueprint for Winter's Presence
description: Unlocks the Winter's Presence collection.

name: Timekeeper Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

description: Grants 10,000 karma.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any shoulder armor.

description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

description: Double-click to open. Contains cloth and logs.

name: Mini Arrowhead
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Essence of Mischief
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Recipe: Peppermint Oil
description: Double-click to unlock the huntsman recipe for Peppermint Oil.

name: Deeply Discounted Fractal Encryption Key
description:
Purchase Limit: 30 Deeply Discounted Fractal Encryption Keys per day.
This item will grant a Fractal Encryption Key. Each key will unlock one Fractal Encryption containing bonus items from the fractals!
Fractal Encryptions can be found in the final reward chest of any fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

name: Mini Gift Skritt
description:
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.
Combine Mini Gift Skritt, Candy Canes, Snowflakes, and an Essence of Skrittish Charity in the Mystic Forge to make a Mini Charitable Gift Skritt.

name: Winter's Blessing
description: Grants a bonus to karma and experience.

details.name: Winter's Blessing
details.description:
+10% Experience in All Game Types
+10% Bonus Karma

name: Skritt's Special Shiny-Cleaning Rag
description:
Rikka gave this to you to help you clean the grime from an extremely dirty cog.

Double-click to clean.

name: Essence of Snowfall
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Discounted Fractal Encryption Key
description:
Purchase Limit: 30 Discounted Fractal Encryption Keys per day.
This item will grant a Fractal Encryption Key. Each key will unlock one Fractal Encryption containing bonus items from the fractals!
Fractal Encryptions can be found in the final reward chest of any fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

name: Cold-Forged Exotic Weapon
description: Contains a random exotic weapon.

name: Recipe: Mintberry Swirl Ice Cream
description: Double-click to learn the chef recipe for Mintberry Swirl Ice Cream.

name: Extremely Dirty Cog
description:
This seems to be the cog that Collector Terksli told you to take to Rikka, who's hiding in Rata Sum. If you had a cleaning rag, you could probably clean it.

Double-click to clean.

name: Personalized Wintersday Gift
description: <c=@flavor>Your name is on the tag. What a nice gift. Double-click to open.</c>

name: Wrapped Gift
description:
This gift can be given to orphans around the city of Divinity's Reach.
"In these days of giving, remember the orphans. A small gift given will bring great joy."—Queen Jennah

description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

description: This will unlock the glider skin in your account wardrobe.

description: Found in Matthias Gabrel's chest. Double-click or trade in at the guild decoration trader to earn a decoration.

name: Eldvin Monastery Brew of the Month Membership
Branded Backpiece
description:
"Bash the dragon, smash the dragon, may it never rise up again!"
—Excerpt from "Bash the Dragon"

name: Bottle of Istan Pale Ale
description: <c=@flavor>Brewed from an ancient Elonian recipe, Istan Pale Ale is full of bitter hops with a unique citrus finish. The perfect beer for a summer day.</c>

name: Elite Glorious Tybalt
description: Consume to unlock this unique Mist Champion skin on your account.

name: Bottle of Queen's Jubilale
description: <c=@flavor>Every celebration should include a brew that's finely crafted for the occasion, and Queen's Jubilale suits that perfectly. A strong, medium-bodied brew with flavors of molasses, light spice, and roasted, dark fruit that will quickly make it a favorite.</c>

description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Tybalt Reward Box
description: This box contains Mist Champion Tybalt, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers. Completing this track gives access to the "Bonus Mist Champion—Tybalt Miniature Reward Track."

description: <c=@flavor>Brewed from ingredients that include Kryta's finest pumpkins, Mad King's Pumpkin Porter delivers a preferable alternative to the trickster spirits tormenting Lion's Arch.</c>

name: Bottle of Bloodstone Orange Summer Ale
description: <c=@flavor>A strong citrus ale brewed with citrus found across Tyria. A small amount of Bloodstone dust included in the brew provides a tingling sensation when swallowed.</c>
